Financial Disclaimer

His Holiness the 14th Dalai Lama does not charge a speaking engagement fee and no aspect of His Holiness' visit to Philadelphia is being used to profit financially. We the committee organizing His Holiness’ visit are committed to financial transparency. Any proceeds raised, whether through donations or ticket sales will be distributed under the advisement of His Holiness the Dalai Lama, and announced at the conclusion of the October 27th public talk.
